price: او بېشكه هغه له تاسو نه ډېر خلك بې لارې كړي، اّيا تاسو عقل نه كارولو؟
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walaqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kathīran afalam takūnū taʿqilūna
